title: Manufacturer's Sample Book, 1939
medium:
Medium: rayon, silk, paper, embossed cardboard
Technique: printed and woven
description: Sample book with a terra-cotta cover embossed to simulate a twilled fabric and printed in black: "Summer Novelty Fabrics, 1939. Moss-Still Incorporated. 663 Fifth Avenue. New York." Contains a total of 65 samples. Printed samples include: 7 silk twills, 4 silk novelties, 2 flat silk crepes, 9 silk chiffons, 7 rayons. Solid-colored fabrics include: 2 silk plain weaves, 2 silk twills, 7 silk and cotton novelties, 1 rayon plain weave, 2 rayon novelties, 1 rayon twill. Wovens include plaids and stripes: 4 silk and 17 rayon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Manufacturer's Sample Book, 1939.
1939. Medium: rayon, silk, paper, embossed cardboard
Technique: printed and woven. Gift of William Hardy, Inc.. 1939-61-8.
